trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_SEQ_00<tab>Kageel Ja requires someone capable of making a distant journey.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_SEQ_01<tab>Deliver the requested items to Kageel Ja.

TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_TODO_00<tab><var 08 E4E80511 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Mine <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> at the Xobr'it Cinderfield)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80512 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Gather <var 31 ((Item)) 04E8060302 /var> at the Xobr'it Cinderfield)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060302 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E4E80513 ((<var 08 E3E802E803 ((Catch <var 31 ((Item)) 02E8060202 /var> at Iq Rrax Tsoly)) ((Deliver <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8060202 /var> to Kageel Ja)) /var>)) (()) /var>)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, are you free for some gathering on the Ut'ohmu Horizon? Anggir needs samples for her research.

TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_001<tab>She's hoping to see if Gok Golma's development has affected the flow of ambient energy in Yak T'el. I'll collect samples from the Ja Tiika Heartland, so with your help we can form a full picture of our gainery's influence.
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_005<tab>Anggir said she'd like stones from the Xobr'it Cinderfield. Simple enough if you can handle the trek, eh?
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_006<tab>Anggir said she'd like bark from trees in the Xobr'it Cinderfield. Simple enough if you can handle the trek, eh?
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_007<tab>Anggir said she'd like a moss sample from Iq Rrax Tsoly. Simple enough if you can handle the trek, eh? Remember to bring golden stonefly nymphs for bait.
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_010<tab>Remember, Anggir is looking for stones from the Xobr'it Cinderfield. It's rather far, but I trust your legs are up for it.
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_011<tab>Remember, Anggir is looking for bark from the Xobr'it Cinderfield. It's rather far, but I trust your legs are up for it.

TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_012<tab>Remember, Anggir is looking for a moss sample from Iq Rrax Tsoly. It's rather far, but I trust your legs are up for it. Oh, and don't forget your golden stonefly nymphs.
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_015<tab>You're back even quicker than I expected, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Were you able to find the samples Anggir asked for?
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_016<tab>Ah, she'll be quite pleased with this. Excellent work!
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_017<tab>You know, Anggir has actually been studying the flow of energy around the area ever since Gok Golma was established.

TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_018<tab>We've done quite a bit of work on the gainery since then, but our accomplishments would mean little if we're negatively impacting the forest as a whole. Anggir takes these inspections very seriously.
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_019<tab>So you can see why we needed your trustworthy hands for the task. We would be grateful if you could help us when we need samples again.
TEXT_BANMAM114_05274_KAGEELJA_000_020<tab>These samples will help us understand how the forest is doing for now. I hope you'll lend us a hand when Anggir does her next survey.
